author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Atlassian Corp Q3 Loss Per Share $0.06
text:
April 19 (Reuters) - Atlassian Corp PLC:
* ATLASSIAN ANNOUNCES THIRD QUARTER FISCAL YEAR 2018 RESULTS
* Q3 LOSS PER SHARE $0.06 * Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.08 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES Q4 2018 REVENUE $232 MILLION TO $234 MILLION * Q3 REVENUE $223.7 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $218.8 MILLION
* SEES Q4 NET LOSS PER DILUTED SHARE IS EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY $0.05 ON AN IFRS BASIS
* SEES Q4 NET INCOME PER DILUTED SHARE IS EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY $0.12 ON A NON-IFRS BASIS
* SEES Q4 GROSS MARGIN IS EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY 81% ON AN IFRS BASIS AND APPROXIMATELY 85% ON A NON-IFRS BASIS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.14, REVENUE VIEW $232.5 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FISCAL YEAR 2018 TOTAL REVENUE IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $862 MILLION TO $864 MILLION
* SEES FISCAL YEAR 2018 NET LOSS PER DILUTED SHARE IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $0.44 TO $0.43 ON AN IFRS BASIS
* SEES FISCAL YEAR 2018 NET INCOME PER DILUTED SHARE IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $0.47 TO $0.48 ON A NON-IFRS BASIS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
